column1: Ad hoc Research by Tindak Malaysia in July 2024 for the voter turnout. There is no 5 pm statistics
Finalised Count refers to final turnout percentage after considering Ordinary, Postal and Early Voting
(Kuala Kubu Baharu 6 pm turnout is an estimate calculated by Tindak Malaysia)
(Sungai Bakap 6 pm turnout is an estimate calculated by Tindak Malaysia)
